data.description: A Perl API for the Sun Grid Engine (Codine).
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module provides a Perl API to the Sun Grid Engine (Codine).
    I've named this module 'Scheduler::Codine', because the name seems
    to be very appropriate. There's already a similar root entry,
    'Schedule'. But this category is obviously something different.
